metadata.title: CVE-2019-16370 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The PGP signing plugin in Gradle before 6.0 relies on the SHA-1 algorithm,which might allow an attacker to replace an artifact with a different onethat has the same SHA-1 message digest, a related issue to CVE-2005-4900.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gradle - 4.4.1-5ubuntu2~18.04+esm1
libgradle-core-java - 4.4.1-5ubuntu2~18.04+esm1
libgradle-plugins-java - 4.4.1-5ubuntu2~18.04+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gradle package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-5ubuntu2~18.04+esm1').
